descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/26731-1-1363012633.jpg[/img]

[center][youtube]BBUKNVv6Ajc[/youtube] [youtube]NlrrEFTXmrk[/youtube][/center]

[center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=5]
V1.3 Features
=======
Araxie Arrows
Pheasant Arrows
Krosis Bow
Posion Ivy Bow
Plain Dark Wood Bow
Plain Ash Bow
Fixes

Optional Replacer and Performance Versions - Now up to date with all Versions

=================================================================
The Bows are Craft-able and Temper-able at the Forge & Workbench
Equal to Daedric in Strength but half the weight
Balanced Ingredients aimed at Higher Level players
=================================================================
Arrows are Craft-able Under the Misc Section in the Forge
Also Added to Loot Level Lists and Merchants.

Merging Level Lists with Wrye Bash is highly recommended
==================================================================

Install Info
===============
Install Via NMM (Recommended)
Or via Bain or Manually


Credits
=======
Bethesda
Deviant Artists for royalty free resources
EvilDeadAsh34 and his Closer Quivers and Longer Arrows mod which provided the mesh for the quivers!
Cabal aka AmidianBorn for some parts of the normal map and the leather straps on the Pheasant Arrows.
[/size][/font][/center]

files.name: GD Iron Arrow Replacer - Araxie
files.changelogHtml:
Added Araxie Arrows to standalone mod - Craftable at forge under "Misc" - Available from merchants and loot via levelled lists
Added Pheasant Replacer + Added Pheasant Performance Version
Added Araxie Replacer + Added Araxie Performance Version
Added Performance (1024) Version of Standalone Mod for Version 1.3
